org.apache.ddlutils.task
Class DumpMetadataTask

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.tools.ant.ProjectComponent
      org.apache.tools.ant.Task
          org.apache.ddlutils.task.DumpMetadataTask

public class DumpMetadataTask
extends org.apache.tools.ant.Task

A simple helper task that dumps information about a database using JDBC.

Version:
$Revision: 289996 $
Marks an ant task
name="dumpMetadata"

setOutputEncoding

public void setOutputEncoding(String encoding)
Specifies the encoding of the output file.

Parameters:
encoding - The encoding
Marks an optional task property
Per default, UTF-8 is used.

Sets the catalog pattern used when accessing the database.

Parameters:
catalogPattern - The catalog pattern
Marks an optional task property
Per default, no specific catalog is used (value %).

setTablePattern

public void setTablePattern(String tablePattern)
Specifies the table to be processed. For details see DatabaseMetaData.getTables(String, String, String, String[]).

Parameters:
tablePattern - The table pattern
Marks an optional task property
By default, all tables are read (value %).

setProcedurePattern

public void setProcedurePattern(String procedurePattern)
Specifies the procedures to be processed. For details and typical table types see DatabaseMetaData.getProcedures(String, String, String).

Parameters:
procedurePattern - The procedure pattern
Marks an optional task property
By default, all procedures are read (value %).

setColumnPattern

public void setColumnPattern(String columnPattern)
Specifies the columns to be processed. For details and typical table types see DatabaseMetaData.getColumns(String, String, String, String).

Parameters:
columnPattern - The column pattern
Marks an optional task property
By default, all columns are read (value %).

setTableTypes

public void setTableTypes(String tableTypes)
Specifies the table types to be processed. For details and typical table types see DatabaseMetaData.getTables(String, String, String, String[]).

Parameters:
tableTypes - The table types to read
Marks an optional task property
By default, all types of tables are read.

setDumpProcedures

public void setDumpProcedures(boolean readProcedures)
Specifies whether procedures shall be read from the database.

Parameters:
readProcedures - true if procedures shall be read
Marks an optional task property
By default, procedures are read.

setDumpTables

public void setDumpTables(boolean readTables)
Specifies whether tables shall be read from the database.

Parameters:
readTables - true if tables shall be read
Marks an optional task property
By default, tables are read.
